channel.title: articles on Andrew Xia
channel.description: Recent content in articles on Andrew Xia

item.title: January 2019 Articles
item.description: Hi all! I thought I’d update y’all with some of my recent readings/watchings on the internet. Business Articles Behind the Big Promises of the Micromobility Industry | CityLab What is the future of transportation? While there is industry hype on self-driving cars, I personally believe that micromobility (dockless bikes and scooters) are the nearer term solution. Fyre: The Greatest Party that Never Happened | Netflix This Netflix documentary, along with Hulu’s take on the Fyre festival, is an introspective take on a failed music festival in 2017 and the lead-up to the disaster.

item.title: August 2018 Articles
item.description: I keep a journal entry to write down my thoughts and also my day to day life (who I hang out with, where I eat etc), though recently I decided to also start keeping track of my digital history, a series of links of articles / websites that I’ve found interesting. Here are some that I’d like to share. Transit Articles Why Is American Mass Transit So Bad? It’s a Long Story | CityLab: this is a good CityLab article about the history of public transit in the US, it’s rise in the early 20th century, and its demise as automobiles became more prevalent in this country in the ensuing decades.
